original_title: Eleftheria Arvanitaki: ‎Face To Face [Live At Stage]
overview: The show "Πρόσωπο Με Πρόσωπο" (Face to Face) recorded on March 5 and 6, 2010 at Stage, in Thessaloniki.
tagline: The 'Voice of Greece' surveys her carrier live on 'The Stage' club
title: Eleftheria Arvanitaki: ‎Face To Face [Live At Stage]
